TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependencyPropertyConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public NotInheritable Class DependencyPropertyConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class DependencyPropertyConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 将字符串转换为 对象。

span.span: Converts from a string to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仅将从转换为的实例。 The class only converts from a into an instance of . 转换时的其他尝试会引发异常。Other attempts at conversion throw an exception. 使用以下输入格式从`.`转换: typeName propertyName 。The converts from a using the following input format: *typeName*`.`*propertyName*. 格式为*namespacePrefix*: 由于旧原因也接受*typeName*`.`*属性名称*, 但忽略*namespacePrefix*: component。A format of *namespacePrefix*:*typeName*`.`*propertyName* is also accepted for legacy reasons but the *namespacePrefix*: component is ignored. 在某些情况下, 也会接受*propertyName*格式的格式;此格式依赖于在上下文中通过的服务实现来评估环境属性并推导*类型名称*。A format of *propertyName* is also accepted in certain cases; this format relies on the ability to evaluate ambient properties and deduce the *typeName*, by service implementation of in the context. 出于传统原因, 此类还支持从 BAML 记录转换, 但这是实现详细信息, 不应依赖。For legacy reasons, this class also supports conversion from BAML records, but this is an implementation detail and should not be relied upon. 此转换器的行为专门面向 XAML 处理的单个 WPF 方案: 读取的属性值并生成一个值。The behavior of this converter is specifically oriented around a single WPF scenario for XAML processing: reading the attribute value of and generating a value.
